author: desruisseaux
msg: Temporarily disable the check for prime meridian in Bursa-Wolf parameters.
We need to revisit this policy, since NTF datum (for instance) have TOWGS84 parameters.
We need to make clear that longitude rotation shall be applied by the callers.
